TutorialÂ¶

This page is a tutorial introduction to gcmpy. It begins with an overview of the workflow structure of the library, and then uses it to build sequentially more complicated network examples.

  • Getting started
  • Creating random networks from marginal data
  • Creating random networks from empirical data
  • Creating random networks using the split degree model
  • Creating random networks from clique covers
